website_summaries.verdict: Developed to support the nutritional needs of active kids and teens, this shake contains a good blend of protein, carbohydrates, fiber, vitamins, and minerals to boost energy and support growth.
pros: Dietician-approved formula strengthens muscles, boosts energy, supports cognitive function, and aids healthy digestion
Covers all the bases with protein, carbohydrates, fiber, omega 3 fatty acids, and vitamins B1, B2, B6, and B12
Contains no high fructose corn syrup, added sugar, aspartame, or stimulants
Delicious flavor with a creamy texture
cons: Not suitable for children under the age of seven

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not the one
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old semi liked it. My 5 year old did not like it (he's my picky kid). I tasted before serving and it was a bit too sweet. Tasted like a melted chocolate shake. I used the blender. I didn't want to throw away the shakes so I decided to make frozen pops. I will continue searching for a shake that my kids like. =-/ Wish I could be refunded. I should probably try a Vitamin store next time so I can be guaranteed if they will give me $ back if the product doesn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Ep

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting shakes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for a healthier shake for my boys. They love to have them for breakfast, before and before there practices/games. They love the taste of them. I add either peanut butter, strawberries, bananas, or just by itself I’m so happy with the shakes and the boys love them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: What a great shake for my kids
customer_reviews.text: What a great shake for my kids, and enjoyable for me as well. My 6 year old son isn't a big breakfast eater, and frequently suffers from hangry meltdowns mid-morning or mid-afternoon. These shakes fill him up with the protein he needs to give him energy throughout the day. We will for sure purchase more and will tell our friends as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think the Cookie and Cream flavor taste really good and I understand why she would ask me for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from my daughter. She loves the Cookie and Cream flavor. Every morning she will ask me to fix her a shake. She will drink the shake on the way to school. Personal, I think the Cookie and Cream flavor taste really good and I understand why she would ask me for a glass every morning. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: j Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff! This seller is wonderful and SO helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff! This seller is wonderful and SO helpful! Would def recommend this product and dealing with this seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Mom

customer_reviews.title: Came with great tips and suggestions for use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Seller expedited the shipment. Came with great tips and suggestions for use. Great ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne C Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting !
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved takes before gymnastic and drinks before school and she says it gives her energy throughout the day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really like the taste and ease of this protein shake
customer_reviews.text: The seller was kind enough to upgrade the standard shipping to expedited so that we could have the product sooner. We really like the taste and ease of this protein shake.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Go! Shakes are a winner with my family!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for kids. The shakes are healthy, delicious and easy to make. My kids love them and they get a good boost of energy after an active day. I recommend this product for any family with active children!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that he will drink this instead of a less ...
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves this product and asks for a shake every day. I like that he will drink this instead of a less healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, my 12 year old daughter loves it, full of vitamins and protein.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping! Seller upgraded and my roger came next day!! But my son doesn't like the taste- we have tried many different ways of preparation. It smells wonderful though!
customer_reviews.author: mindyp

customer_reviews.title: He states that the taste is great and better than many products he has tried
customer_reviews.text: My son is a wrestler and uses this to help maintain his weight. He states that the taste is great and better than many products he has tried. I love the personal notes that the seller provides with every order. It does feel great that he takes time to do that, as well as how fast the shipment came to our house.
customer_reviews.author: aaron shepler

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the chocolate today. Seller upgraded shipping so it arrived and as soon as my son saw it he wanted to try it. Needless to say he loved it and so does his sister. I will buy more and possibly try the cookies and cream. Can't wait to try the chocolate with a little peanut butter. Will be good before games, breakfast, or just a good snack. Much better than giving in to junk food!
customer_reviews.author: Kelbel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shake for my daughter. She loves it! I am happy to have found a healthy protein shake that she likes and is not filled with sugars. She loves it for breakfast or for a snack anytime of day!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: My kids request proteins shakes daily!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for over a year now and my kids (12 &10) request protein shakes almost daily. They love the taste of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Wagz

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Healthy Protein Shake for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this shake because I have tried the Skinny Jane products before and they were amazing! This product is also just as great as the Skinny Jane shakes! Not only are they healthy and nutritious, but they taste amazing! The GO Pro-Shakes are not loaded up with sugar, but nutrients that a kid or teen needs. I used the GO Pro-Shakes to replace my breakfast in the morning and it holds me over for hours. I highly recommend this product if you are looking for a healthy shake that can be used for a snack or meal replacement for your children.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Walden

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how much my kids love this protein shake! It gives them so much energy!
customer_reviews.author: ebony

customer_reviews.title: Great shake for young athletes!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Lean180 products by this company with great success so I thought I would give the Go Pro shake a try for myself and my students. I tried the chocolate and love the taste! I am professional tennis coach to kids of all ages so I have let them try it as well. So far they all like using it as a snack or after practice to regain lost nutrients. I would recommend it to any young athletes that want to perform better in the gym or in their sport.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Brockriede

customer_reviews.title: like a milkshake!
customer_reviews.text: The shake is so thick and rich.Truly tastes like a milkshake. The shake is packed with good stuff - slow digesting carbs, protein, and omega-3s. Because it is so healthy I use it as a recovery drink after working out. I attached a video with my favorite recipe below!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Nutritious Shakes!
customer_reviews.text: GO! Pro-Shakes taste amazing! I drank it in the morning for breakfast and it held me over for hours. They are easy to make either in the blender or in a shaker bottle. I would highly recommend this product to anyone that is looking for a nutritious shake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GO! Pro Shakes - Delicious Protein Shake Smoothie for Kids and Teens - Low Sugar - Healthy Snack - Good Nutrition (Chocolate, 15 Serving)

Satisfying and Energy Replenishing Snack or Breakfast Substitute for Active Kids on the Go!
Scientifically Formulated with Brain Sharpening Omega 3s and 3 grams of Fiber to Aid Healthy Digestion
No High Fructose Corn Syrup, No Added Sugar, No Aspartame, No Caffeine, No Stimulants of Any Kind
